name: Take Cover! (DONEWITHWORK)
description: Getting Candy couldn't have been Harder 😁😁 Dodge the bombs, collect the candy and most importantly ... STAY ALIVE!!! _____________________________________________ ATTRIBUTIONS: Slime Monster (Bonsaiheldin) :  https://opengameart.org/content/slime-monster-24x24 candy (magdum) : https://opengameart.org/content/blinking-candy _____________________________________________ NOTE FROM DEVELOPER: This is my sixth game jam and couldn't be more excited. _____________________________________________
